snippet: As the Afghan war draws to a close, the American military has already began an immense logistical effort, spanning half the globe, to ship back its equipment.
abstract: American military has begun immense logistical effort, spanning half the globe, to ship back all of its equipment from Afghanistan as the war draws to a close; issue is also freighted with sensitivities, as officials calculate how to avoid giving Afghan forces the sense they are abandoning them.

byline.contributor: Sangar Rahimi contributed reporting from Kabul, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: As the Afghan war draws to a close, the American military has already began an immense logistical effort, spanning half the globe, to ship back its equipment.

headline.seo: In Afghanistan, U.S. Packs War Gear for the Movers
headline.main: U.S. Begins Packing Its Afghan War Gear for the Movers
headline.print_headline: U.S. Begins Packing Its Afghan War Gear for the Movers

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
